name: Jacques Villeneuve, Sr.
introduction: Jacques-Joseph Villeneuve (JACK VILL-neuve; born 4 November 1953 in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu, Montrgie, Quebec, Canada), commonly known as Jacques Villeneuve, Sr. is a Canadian racing driver who made three entries (all non-qualifications) in Formula One in the early 1980s.  He is the younger brother of Gilles Villeneuve and the uncle of 1997 champion Jacques Villeneuve.
